headline: Digital Realty Trust (DLR): Assessing Valuation After Recent 12% Share Price Decline
summary: Digital Realty Trust (DLR) shares have lost ground over the past month, slipping nearly 12%. This decline has drawn attention from investors looking to understand what is weighing on this data center operator. Recent performance contrasts with stronger returns seen in past years. See our latest analysis for Digital Realty Trust. While Digital Realty Trust’s share price has slipped more than 12% in the past month, this follows a year of generally fading momentum, with its 1-year total...
